label: 敏達天皇
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Emperor (r. 572-85) who reigned during the era in which the tension between the Soga and Mononobe clans was rising, manifested particularlyin the debate over whether or not to support the newly imported Buddhist religion.
